name: Save Yourselves
description:
Your future nemesis and his alien army have gone back in time to kill baby you! That way you can never grow up to challenge them...

Luckily, you can time travel back and stop them!

Unfortunately, they can also time travel back and stop you from stopping them...

But you can travel back to stop them from stopping you from... ugh. This is getting confusing!

Every round your actions are recorded and then replayed as past versions of yourself. Your job is to defend your past selves from an ever increasing alien attack!

If a past version of yourself dies... well... then I have bad news for present you...

With some good temporal teamwork and forward thinking, your past selves can help you vanquish your alien nemesis and put an end to the loop once and for all!
